members.member:
logs in a registered user
the login form model, from body the logged-in user returns the logged-in user
sample request (this request logs in a registered user)\ POST /users/login\ {\ "Email" : "sampleEmail",\ "Password" : "samplePassword"\ } >

registers new user
the register form model, from body the registered user returns the registered user
sample request (this request registers new user)\ POST /users/register\ {\ "Email" : "sampleEmail",\ "Username" : "sampleUsername",\ "FirstName" : "sampleFirstName",\ "LastName" : "sampleLastName",\ "Password" : "samplePassword",\ "ConfirmPassword" : "samplePassword", } >
